base_description: Rectangular, gray remote with circular buttons.
part_description: Features 40 circular buttons, arranged in rows and columns, including a cross-shaped button area.
internal_interaction_description: The circular buttons are embedded on the surface, with some forming a cross shape for directional input. Each button likely connects to an internal circuit board to send signals when pressed.
external_interaction_description: The remote interacts with electronic devices, transmitting signals when buttons are pressed. Users hold it in hand, pressing buttons to control devices like TVs or media players.
